name: Raveyard Robber
description:
You're a disco wizard on a journey to figure out what's upsetting the denizens of the Rave-yard! Using your magical disco ball and upgrades every morning, help the undead of the Rave-yard jam out!

Can you survive the week and save the Rave-yard?

20 unique upgrades to get on your run!

7 synergies!

1 bullet-hell crazy boss!

2 endings!

Controls:

WASD/Arrow Keys/Left Stick on controller - Move

Space/X on controller - Interact

Escape/Start on controller - Pause

Alt+Enter - Fullscreen Toggle

Credits :

Music -

Programmer/Artist/Main Concept Designer - https://kisara-dev.itch.io/

Director/Concept Designer - https://www.youtube.com/channel/UChLPRnXSWAFGxLtCQOybsjA

(This is a downloadable version of the game for the #noticeme jam on GXC)

Play the game on GXC for the #noticeme jam: https://gxc.gg/games/g5hil6/Rave-yard-Robber/
